* [ ] coc使用preview打开定义buffer 查一下怎么使用preview打开 skywind3000的插件里应该有一个例子
      function! s:definition_other_window() abort
        if winnr('$') >= 4 || (winwidth(0) - (max([len(line('$')), &numberwidth-1]) + 1)) < 110
          exec "normal \<Plug>(coc-definition)"
        else
          exec 'vsplit'
          exec "normal \<Plug>(coc-definition)"
        endif
      endfunction
